name: talus
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
[ C ]
  medical
  plural tali uk/ˈteɪ.laɪ/ a bone forming part of the ankle joint: a talus fracture

[ C or U ]
  geology
  plural taluses large, loose broken stones on the side of a mountain, or an area covered with stones like this: The settlement is built on the black talus of an active volcano. Synonym
scree
